name: Dinner Show & Desert Safari in Dubai | Noble Life

data.text: Noble Life is proud to present our flagship experience: the Noble Dinner Show & Safari, Dubai’s most celebrated desert experience.
Your journey begins between 2:00-2:30 PM with a luxury 4×4 pickup, guided by our expert Noble guides.

After venturing deep into the golden dunes, you’ll experience the adrenaline of dune bashing, the thrill of sandboarding, and a pause for breathtaking sunset photos. For those seeking more excitement, optional quad bikes and dune buggies are available before arriving at the iconic Noble Camp.

An Instagram favourite and recognised with a TripAdvisor Traveller Choice Award with over 5,000 five-star TripAdvisor reviews, the evening continues with camel rides, falcon encounters, henna artistry, Arabic hospitality, and our new world-class dinner show ‘Noble Desert Mirage’ - with live performances and the unforgettable Noble Fire Show.

items: Luxury hotel pickup & drop-off in Noble’s private 4×4 vehicles
Dune bashing adventure and sandboarding on golden desert slopes
Pause for breathtaking sunset photography atop the dunes
Optional quad bike or dune buggy rides for thrill seekers
Warm welcome at Noble Camp with Arabic coffee, Luqaimat sweets, and traditional hospitality
Explore a souq-style camp with Noble-branded goods and local handicrafts
Camel rides, baby camel feeding, henna artistry, and falcon photo opportunities
Dedicated children’s play area for young adventurers
Dining choices: lavish BBQ buffet or VIP 4-course chef’s menu with premium service
Evening entertainment featuring nine exclusive live performances including live singer, cultural dances, and the Noble Fire Show
Licensed bar available with house beverages included in Platinum option
Return transfer to your hotel around 9:30 PM

data.text: Know before you go
Extra Charges apply for pickup outside of Dubai & Sharjah, see below:

items: Extra Charges for Pick Up
Border Dubai - Abu Dhabi - 500 AED
Abu Dhabi - 1000 AED
Ajman - 700 AED
Any damage, injuries, or loss of personal items during the quad biking are the participant's responsibility, as insurance does not cover this activity.
The tour duration is approximately 9 hours.
Pickup will be scheduled 45 minutes before your chosen departure time, so please be ready in your hotel lobby accordingly.
Kindly provide your WhatsApp number for smoother communication during the pickup process.
Participants are responsible for any injury to themselves or others resulting from the use of buggies or ATVs.
Pickup times may shift by an hour earlier in the morning or later in the afternoon due to summer heat. Guests will be notified in advance if changes occur.

data.text: Allergens
Kindly note that our food may contain traces of allergens, including gluten, sesame, soy, celery, and nuts. Please ask your server for more details.
FAQ

What is the difference between the Noble Dinner Show Only & Noble Dinner Show & Safari? The Noble Dinner Show & Safari package includes an adventurous desert experience before the dinner show (Noble Desert Mirage). Guests will visit the quad and buggy zone, go dune bashing, and try sandboarding. The Dinner Show only package starts later, with a pickup at 14:00, and guests are taken directly to the camp, skipping the desert adventure activities.
Are pets allowed?Unfortunately, pets are not allowed at our camp. However, we have our own friendly animals that guests can enjoy and interact with.

What are the children's rates?Children aged 0-2 years can join for free. For children aged 3-12 years, there is a special rate of 270 AED for all packages. From the age of 12, they are charged the adult rate.

Do you offer vegetarian meals?Yes, we offer a variety of vegetarian dishes. Vegetarian meals are available both in the buffet and in the 4-course set menu, providing a range of delicious options for our guests.

What is the difference between Premium, GOLD, and PLATINUM zones?Premium: Standard seating with access to the premium buffet and a barbeque grill served at your table.

GOLD: Enhanced seating closer to the stage, featuring a 4-course meal prepared by our 5-star chef, along with waiter service.

PLATINUM: Exclusive seating with prime views, a private 4-course meal prepared by our 5-star chef, 2 complimentary drinks, and personalized service.
How can we contact you for B2B inquiries?For B2B partnerships or inquiries, you can reach out to us at +971 56 857 0711.

What activities are available for children?Our camp offers a wide range of activities for children, including camel rides, baby camel feeding, chill zones, a kids' zone, archery, and sandboarding. There are plenty of ways for children to enjoy their time at the camp.

Is there a kids' menu?As part of the package children have access to the full Premium Gourmet Buffet with a full range of dishes. However, should you have any special requirements, please, contact us in advance.
Do you offer group discounts?Discounts are arranged individually depending on the group size and the season. Please contact us for more details.

Can we organize private events for large groups at the camp?Yes, absolutely! We have special zones for private events, and we can decorate the area according to your event theme. Whether it's a corporate event, birthday party, or any other occasion, we can accommodate your group with customized setups.

Are quad bikes and buggies included in the price?The quad and buggy zone is the first stop during the safari experience. These activities are not included in the package price, but you can select and pay for them on-site. Prices start from 120 AED for a 30-minute quad ride.

What is your cancellation policy?
  • Full refund for cancellations made more than 24 hours before the scheduled time.

  • 50% refund for cancellations made 12 to 24 hours in advance.

  • No refund for cancellations made within 12 hours of the appointment.

data.text: Step into the magic of the Noble Desert Mirage Show, our new Desert Dinner show for the 25/26 season - the crown jewel of Noble Life’s evening experiences, hosted at the award-winning Noble Camp.

Your journey begins with a 4×4 pickup between 4:00–4:30 PM, taking you deep into the desert for an unforgettable night of storytelling, culture, and entertainment. Upon arrival, you’ll be greeted with authentic Arabic hospitality, traditional sweets, and the chance to enjoy camel rides, falcon encounters, and henna artistry before the show begins.

Noble Camp unveils Noble Desert Mirage: Ali and Layla’s love story rises from the sands to the skyline - an epic journey where devotion conquers distance, time, and fate, and the birth of modern Dubai becomes the backdrop for their reunion.

As the stars illuminate the dunes, indulge in a gourmet buffet or VIP 4-course dinner, then witness the spellbinding Noble Desert Mirage - a world-class production of music, dance, and the iconic Noble Fire Show, celebrating the spirit and beauty of Dubai’s desert.

items: Premium hotel pickup & drop-off in Noble’s private 4×4 vehicles
Arrive at Noble Camp and be greeted with Arabic coffee and Luqaimat sweets
Explore a vibrant souq-style camp with Noble-branded goods and local handicrafts
Enjoy camel rides, baby camel feeding, henna artistry, and falcon photo opportunities
Dedicated children’s play area for younger guests
Dining options include a lavish gourmet buffet or an exclusive VIP 4-course Michelin Star Chef curated menu with premium seating and service
Licensed bar available with house beverages included in the Platinum option
Evening entertainment featuring nine exclusive live performances, including a singer, cultural dances, and the Noble Fire Show
Concludes around 9:30 PM with a return transfer to your hotel

data.text: FAQ

What is the difference between the Noble Dinner Show & Safari and Noble Dinner Show - Desert Mirage?The Noble Dinner Show includes transfers, camp activities, dining, and entertainment, while our new show programme for the 25/26 season - Noble Desert Mirage. The Dinner Show focuses primarily on dinner and performances without additional safari experience.
Are pets allowed?No, pets are not permitted at the camp.
What are the children’s rates?Reduced rates apply for children; infants may join free (confirm during booking).
Do you offer vegetarian meals?Yes, both buffet and VIP menus include vegetarian dishes.

What is the difference between Premium, Gold, and Platinum zones?Premium offers buffet dining with standard seating. Gold offers upgraded seating with buffet dining. Platinum includes a 4-course chef’s menu, house beverages, and prime seating.
How can we contact you for B2B inquiries?Please use the contact form on our website or you can reach out to us at +971 56 857 0711.
What activities are available for children?Kids can enjoy the dedicated play area, camel feeding, henna, and family-friendly shows.
Is there a kids’ menu?Yes, a children’s selection is included within the buffet and VIP set menu.
Do you offer group discounts or private events?Yes, Noble Camp can be reserved for private events, and group pricing is available upon request.
Are quad bikes and buggies included?No, this is a dinner-only experience; quads and buggies are not included.
What is your cancellation policy?Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the experience. Late cancellations are non-refundable.

name: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi Full-Day Entry | The World’s Fastest Theme Park

data.text: Get ready for a full-throttle adventure at Ferrari World Abu Dhabi, the world’s first Ferrari-branded theme park and home to the fastest roller coaster on the planet — Formula Rossa.

Located on Yas Island, Ferrari World combines Italian passion, cutting-edge technology, and family-friendly fun across 40+ rides and attractions. Experience the rush of F1-level acceleration, explore Ferrari’s racing heritage through immersive exhibits, and enjoy interactive zones perfect for kids and adults alike.
Whether you’re a motorsport enthusiast or simply chasing an unforgettable day out, Ferrari World delivers non-stop excitement under one spectacular red roof.

items: Ride Formula Rossa — the world’s fastest roller coaster (240 km/h)
Immerse in Ferrari-inspired rides, simulators & exhibitions
Perfect for families — kids’ zones, interactive games & junior tracks
Enjoy new experiences like the Esports Arena
Tour a virtual Ferrari factory and feel the thrill of innovation
Located on Yas Island — ideal for combining with Warner Bros. World or Yas Waterworld
Free Dubai shuttle available

data.text: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi is the world’s first Ferrari-branded theme park and one of the UAE’s most iconic attractions. Located on Yas Island, this massive indoor entertainment destination offers over 40 rides, simulators, and experiences inspired by the speed, style, and innovation of the Ferrari brand. With attractions for all ages, from high-thrill coasters to family-friendly zones, Ferrari World delivers a full day of action, adventure, and automotive excitement.

The park’s most famous ride is Formula Rossa, the world’s fastest roller coaster, which accelerates to speeds of 240 km/h in just under five seconds. Other highlights include cutting-edge racing simulators, the Turbo Track vertical coaster, and a virtual tour of the Ferrari factory in Maranello. Families can enjoy attractions like Junior Grand Prix, Nello’s Adventureland, and interactive exhibits that introduce kids to the world of racing and engineering. Whether you are a motorsport fan or just looking for a fun-filled day, Ferrari World has something for everyone.

Visitors should arrive early, especially on weekends or holidays, as ride availability is first-come, first-served. Tickets include unlimited access to all attractions and, if selected, optional hotel transfers or free shuttle service from central Dubai locations. The park is entirely indoors, making it a year-round destination regardless of the weather. Amenities include prayer rooms, baby care facilities, lockers, valet parking, and a wide range of dining outlets. Outside food and beverages are not permitted.

Certain rides are not suitable for guests with heart, neck, or back conditions, pregnant women, or very young children. Height and weight restrictions apply to some thrill rides, and all visitors must comply with safety guidelines. Comfortable attire and closed shoes are recommended for ride access. Transfers operate only from designated areas in Dubai and must be booked in advance if required.

Ferrari World Abu Dhabi is a must-visit attraction for anyone traveling to the UAE. It offers a rare combination of high-speed thrills, immersive experiences, and family-friendly fun under one roof. Whether you come for the record-breaking roller coasters or to explore the spirit of Ferrari, this theme park promises a day of unforgettable memories on Yas Island.
About This Tour

items: Location: Yas Island, Abu Dhabi
Theme: Ferrari-branded rides, attractions, and interactive experiences
Park Size: 86,000 square meters
Attractions: Over 40 rides and experiences, including the world’s fastest roller coaster
Transfer Options: Hotel pickup/drop-off available (if selected)
Free Shuttle: From Dubai available (check official route map)
Booking Info: Ride slots must be booked inside the park on arrival (first-come, first-served)

items: Outside food and beverages

Eating or drinking inside transfer vehicles

data.text: Know Before You Go

items: Ferrari World is fully indoor – ideal year-round, even in summer
Ride availability is first-come, first-served - arrive early
Plan at least 4–6 hours for the full experience
Some rides have height/weight restrictions
Tickets are non-refundable once used or partially used
Shuttle operates on fixed schedules; confirm time and pickup point before departure
Children must be accompanied by an adult at all times
Valet parking, lockers, and stroller rental available (extra cost)
Outside food and drinks are not permitted
Some rides may be under maintenance periodically
Arrive early to secure ride slots (first-come, first-served)
Transfers operate from central Dubai areas only (Deira, Bur Dubai, Marina, SZR)
Smoking, eating, and drinking not allowed inside transfer vehicles

data.text: Allergens
Food and beverages sold on-site may contain or come into contact with gluten, sesame, soy, celery, and nuts. Please ask staff for details if you have dietary restrictions.
Cancellation & Weather Policy

items: No refunds for no-shows or unused tickets
Tickets may be rescheduled in case of operational issues or park closures
Weather does not affect access (indoor venue)
Refunds only if full park closure occurs

data.text: FAQ
Where is Ferrari World located?Ferrari World is on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, approximately 1.5 hours from central Dubai.
What’s the fastest ride in the park?Formula Rossa — reaching speeds up to 240 km/h in under five seconds.
Is Ferrari World suitable for children?Yes! There are many family rides like Junior Grand Prix and Nello’s Adventureland.
Can I bring food inside?No, outside food and beverages are not allowed inside the park.
Is transport included?Transfers are included if selected. A free Dubai shuttle is also available — check the official route map for timing.

name: Aquaventure World Dubai: Waterpark Entry Ticket at Atlantis The Palm

data.text: Dive into Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark, the world’s largest waterpark and one of Dubai’s most iconic attractions. Located at the world-famous Atlantis, The Palm resort, this award-winning destination blends adrenaline, relaxation, and marine discovery, all in one breathtaking setting.

From record-breaking slides like Leap of Faith and Aquaconda to the family-favorite Splashers Island, every corner of the park offers excitement for all ages. Whether you’re looking to race down high-speed slides, float through calm rivers, or unwind on a private beach, Aquaventure promises a full day of unforgettable fun.

Choose between a Day Pass for the waterpark or a Super Pass that includes entry to The Lost Chambers Aquarium, home to over 65,000 marine animals. Upgrade your experience with Surf’s Up, ray feeding, or even the Atlantean Flyer Zipline for the ultimate thrill above the waves.
A must-visit destination for families, couples, and adventure-seekers alike, Aquaventure is where the magic of Atlantis meets the spirit of Dubai.

items: Visit the largest waterpark in the world, part of Atlantis, The Palm
Ride world-famous slides like Leap of Faith, Aquaconda, and Poseidon’s Revenge
Enjoy Splashers Island, a water paradise for kids
Access to Adventure Beach, a 700-meter private shoreline
Explore Lost Chambers Aquarium (Super Pass) with 65,000+ marine animals
Optional extras: zipline, shark snorkel, and ray feeding
Relaxed yet thrilling experience for all ages

data.text: Aquaventure Waterpark at Atlantis, The Palm is the largest waterpark in the Middle East, offering a full day of excitement for families, couples, and thrill-seekers alike. Located on the crescent of Dubai’s Palm Jumeirah, this iconic destination features more than 30 water slides, marine activities, and private beach access. Whether you're here for adrenaline-pumping rides, family-friendly splash zones, or a relaxing float along the lazy river, Aquaventure provides a wide variety of experiences in one of Dubai's most scenic resort settings.

The park is home to record-breaking attractions like the Leap of Faith, a near-vertical slide through a shark-filled lagoon, as well as Poseidon’s Revenge, Zoomerango, and the multi-person Aquaconda. Families with younger children will find plenty to enjoy at Splashers Island, a dedicated area designed for safe and interactive water play. Aquaventure also includes access to Adventure Beach, a 700-meter stretch of private shoreline reserved for park guests, and the Surf’s Up wave rider experience for those looking to test their balance and skill.

Guests who choose the Super Pass can also explore the Lost Chambers Aquarium, which houses over 65,000 marine animals across a series of immersive exhibits. This additional access offers a quieter, educational contrast to the high-energy thrills of the waterpark. For those looking to enhance their visit, optional extras like shark snorkeling, ray feeding, and even a zipline over the park are available at an additional cost.

Visitors must wear proper swimwear and are advised to bring essentials like sunscreen, towels, flip-flops, and waterproof phone pouches. Lockers and towels are available for rent on-site, and guests are encouraged to arrive early to make the most of their day and avoid peak-hour queues. Outside food, beverages, and alcohol are not allowed, and children must be accompanied by an adult at all times. Some rides have height or health restrictions, so it’s important to review park guidelines before entering.

Aquaventure Waterpark offers a balanced blend of relaxation, excitement, and discovery, making it one of Dubai’s most popular year-round attractions. Whether you’re racing down world-class slides or strolling through the Lost Chambers, this experience delivers both adventure and atmosphere in equal measure. Perfect for a day out on Palm Jumeirah, it’s a must-visit destination for anyone seeking water-based fun in Dubai.
About This Tour

items: 📍 Location: Atlantis, The Palm, Palm Jumeirah, Dubai
💦 Attractions: Over 30 rides, slides, and marine-themed experiences
🌊 Includes: Adventure Beach, Lost Chambers Aquarium (with Super Pass), and Surf’s Up
🎢 Signature Slides: Leap of Faith, Aquaconda, Poseidon’s Revenge, Zoomerango, Slitherine
🐠 Aquarium Access: 65,000+ marine creatures in Lost Chambers Aquarium
🚐 Transfers: Optional hotel transfers available (shared or private)
📅 Booking Info: Ticket types vary by inclusions (check options before booking)

data.text: FAQ
Is Aquaventure suitable for young children?Yes, Splashers Island and Splashers Lagoon are designed specifically for kids.
What’s the difference between Day Pass and Super Pass?The Super Pass includes all-day park access plus entry to The Lost Chambers Aquarium.
Can I buy food inside the park?Yes, there are multiple restaurants and snack outlets throughout Aquaventure.
What if I forget my swimwear?Swimwear and essentials can be purchased from retail stores on-site.
Is the park open during winter?Yes, the water is temperature-controlled, and the park operates year-round.
Discover the Noble Dinner Cruise - where fine dining, elegance, and entertainment meet the sea.

Sail through Dubai’s iconic skyline aboard a luxury vessel designed to impress at any time of day. Whether you join for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, every cruise combines world-class gastronomy, exceptional service, and breathtaking views.

This refined dining experience offers an intimate, seated setting for couples, families, and groups, each table enjoying private service, a curated multi-course menu, and live entertainment onboard. Available three times daily, the Noble Dinner Cruise is ideal for travelers and residents seeking a seamless blend of luxury, atmosphere, and unforgettable moments on the water.

data.text: FAQ
How long is the cruise?Approximately 1.5–2 hours depending on weather and route.
Is it a private charter?The Noble Dinner Cruise is a shared experience, sold per seat, with private tables for each group. Private hire is available upon request.

What’s the difference between the Upper and Lower Deck?Lower Deck offers elegant indoor dining with large windows and climate control. Upper Deck offers open-air dining with panoramic skyline views and priority seating.
Are alcoholic beverages included?No, bar service is available at an additional cost.
Can children join?Yes, children are welcome on all sailings. Reduced rates apply for children under 12.
Is this suitable for events or group bookings?Yes, the vessel can be fully reserved for private events, corporate functions, or celebrations.
What should guests wear?Smart-casual or semi-formal attire is recommended.
Where does the cruise depart from?Boarding is from Dubai Harbour; location details are provided upon booking.
Set sail in style with Noble Life’s Private Yacht Charter — a bespoke cruise crafted for romance, celebrations, corporate events, and everything in between.

Your journey begins at Dubai Harbour Yacht Club, where our professional captain and crew welcome you aboard for a seamless, fully tailored experience. Cruise past Dubai Marina, Ain Dubai (Bluewaters), JBR, Sheikh’s Island, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, and The Royal Atlantis.

From intimate 40ft cruisers to majestic 250ft superyachts for up to 800 guests, choose curated menus (including live BBQ or breakfast), optional Jet Skis and sea toys, and premium Noble catering. This is more than a boat ride — it’s your private celebration on the water.

data.text: Noble Life’s Private Yacht Charter is the ultimate way to experience Dubai from the water. Whether you're planning a romantic getaway, celebrating a birthday, or hosting a corporate event, our charter service provides a luxurious and flexible way to cruise through the city’s most iconic locations. Your journey starts at Dubai Harbour Yacht Club, where our professional crew welcomes you aboard for a tailored experience designed around your needs.

Depending on your chosen vessel, you’ll sail past Dubai Marina, Ain Dubai, JBR, the Sheikh’s private island, The Palm, Burj Al Arab, and The Royal Atlantis. Every route is designed to offer panoramic views of the city skyline while you relax in comfort with refreshments and music onboard. Choose from intimate 40-foot cruisers or go all-out with 250-foot superyachts that can host up to 800 guests. Each charter is private and customisable.

Charters include a professional captain and crew, soft drinks, towels, a Bluetooth sound system, and the option to add curated catering. Morning and longer cruises can include freshly prepared breakfasts or live BBQs on board. Premium menus, sea toys, and Jet Ski add-ons are available on request. Guests are also encouraged to bring a playlist to set the perfect vibe during the journey.

Please note, bookings must be made in advance with a minimum of two hours per charter. All experiences are subject to Coast Guard approval and weather conditions. Alcohol, special requests, or dietary requirements can be arranged ahead of time, but external food or walk-in guests are not allowed. Footwear must be removed before boarding, with secure lockers provided on board.

To enjoy the experience fully, bring your Emirates ID or passport, sunglasses, sunscreen, swimwear if you plan to dive in, and a camera for stunning content. The yachts are not wheelchair accessible and are not suitable for children under five. If weather disrupts your scheduled time, we’ll assist with rescheduling or offer a full refund. This is yachting in Dubai done right. It is personalised, premium, and unforgettable.
About This Tour

items: Duration: Minimum 2 hours to full overnight experiences
Departure Point: Dubai Harbour Yacht Club
Fleet Size: 40ft to 250ft yachts available

Wheelchair Access: Not available

Can we swim or Jet Ski during the trip?Absolutely! Swimming is encouraged and Jet Skis can be added to your booking.
Do you cater for birthdays or corporate events?Yes — we specialize in private celebrations, brand launches, and group experiences.
What happens if the weather is bad?Trips may be rescheduled or refunded based on weather and Coast Guard conditions.

name: Dubai Atlantis Balloon Ride | Sky-High Views Over The Palm

data.text: Soar to new heights with The Dubai Balloon at Atlantis, an awe-inspiring vertical flight experience offering breathtaking 360° views of Dubai’s skyline, coastline, and the world-famous Palm Jumeirah.
Ascend up to 300 meters (the height of a 100-storey skyscraper) aboard a state-of-the-art helium balloon guided by a certified pilot.
This serene 10-minute flight combines adventure and tranquility, delivering unforgettable panoramic views of Atlantis, The Royal, and the Arabian Gulf.
Whether you’re a thrill-seeker, photographer, or simply looking to experience Dubai from a new perspective, the Atlantis Balloon is an unmissable sky-high experience.

items: 10-minute flight up to 300 meters high
Certified professional pilot onboard
360° panoramic views of Palm Jumeirah & Atlantis
Peaceful, safe, and family-friendly
Ideal for sunrise, daytime, or sunset flights
Perfect photo opportunity for Dubai’s skyline

data.text: The Dubai Atlantis Balloon Ride offers a rare chance to see the city from 300 meters in the air, delivering sweeping views of the Palm Jumeirah, the Arabian Gulf, and the city skyline. Located at Atlantis, The Palm, this vertical helium balloon experience is designed for anyone seeking a peaceful and photogenic escape above Dubai. Whether you’re a tourist visiting for the first time or a resident looking for a new way to see the city, this 10-minute flight provides a calm and breathtaking adventure high above the iconic waterfront.

Once onboard, you’ll ascend gently to the equivalent height of a 100-storey building, with nothing but open views in every direction. The balloon is piloted by a certified professional and features the latest safety technology, offering a secure environment that still feels thrilling. The observation platform allows for unobstructed views, making it ideal for capturing standout photos of Atlantis, The Royal, and the crescent of the Palm. While the flight itself lasts around ten minutes, guests are advised to allow extra time for boarding, briefings, and possible queues during weekends or holidays.

This experience appeals to a wide range of visitors, from families and couples to photographers and special occasion guests. However, there are a few restrictions in place. Pregnant women over three months, guests with recent surgeries or heart conditions, and those under the influence of alcohol or drugs are not permitted to fly. Children under 18 must be accompanied by an adult over the age of 21. All participants must sign a safety and health waiver prior to the flight and present a valid ID or passport at the venue.

While there is no food or drink onboard, the balloon area is surrounded by the wider facilities of Atlantis, allowing guests to continue their visit with dining or sightseeing nearby. The balloon ride does not include transportation, so visitors must make their own way to the venue. Weather conditions may affect operations, and all flights are subject to delays or cancellations based on wind or visibility. Real-time updates can be checked via the weather widget provided upon booking.

For those looking to experience something different in Dubai, the Atlantis Balloon Ride is a short but powerful moment of stillness and perspective above the city. It’s an ideal addition to a luxury itinerary or a spontaneous activity on a sunny day, offering one of the best viewpoints in the region. From sunrise to sunset, it delivers an unmatched aerial view of one of the world’s most famous man-made islands and a new way to experience the city from above.
About This Tour

items: Flight Duration: Approximately 10 minutes
Location: Atlantis, The Palm – Dubai
Altitude: Up to 300 meters high
Access: Entry via ticket scanned at venue or turnstile
Weather Advisory: Check our live weather widget before booking (link provided upon purchase)
Peak Times: Please allow extra time during weekends and holidays due to queues

data.text: FAQ
How high does the balloon go?Up to 300 meters, depending on weather conditions.
Is it safe?Yes, it’s operated by certified professional pilots with full aviation compliance.
Is there food or drink onboard?No, food and drinks are not allowed during the flight.
Can children join?Yes, but anyone under 18 must be accompanied by an adult over 21.
Can I get a refund if I’m late or it’s windy?No refunds for lateness. In case of bad weather, your flight will be rescheduled.

name: Gyrocopter Dubai Flight | Iconic Aerial Views of Palm & Burj Al Arab

data.text: Experience Dubai like never before with Noble Life’s Gyrocopter Flight, a breathtaking 20-minute adventure soaring 1,500 feet above the Arabian Gulf.

Operated by Skydive Dubai, this aerial experience offers a spectacular perspective of the Burj Al Arab, Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis, and The World Islands — all from the open cockpit of a two-seater gyrocopter.
Enjoy a smooth, scenic ride guided by a professional pilot, complete with safety gear, pre-flight briefing, and high-quality photos and videos of your journey.
Perfect for thrill-seekers who want the exhilaration of flight without the intensity of skydiving, this is one of Dubai’s most unforgettable experiences.

items: 20-minute guided gyrocopter flight operated by Skydive Dubai
Soar 1,500 feet above the Palm, Burj Al Arab & Dubai coastline
Includes free HD photos and professionally edited flight video
One passenger per flight with certified pilot
Scenic, safe, and smooth — ideal for first-time flyers
Lightweight open-cockpit aircraft for uninterrupted views
Perfect bucket-list activity for visitors or Dubai residents

data.text: The Dubai Gyrocopter Flight is one of the most unique ways to experience the city’s world-famous skyline. Operated by Skydive Dubai and departing from the Palm Drop Zone, this 20-minute flight takes you up to 1,500 feet above the coastline in a two-seater gyrocopter. With a certified pilot navigating the aircraft, you’ll enjoy panoramic views of Dubai’s most iconic landmarks including the Burj Al Arab, Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis, and The World Islands. Unlike skydiving, this experience is calm, controlled, and focused on sightseeing, making it ideal for those who want a thrilling view without the intensity of a freefall.

From takeoff to landing, every detail is handled with professionalism and safety in mind. Passengers are given protective goggles, a pre-flight briefing, and lockers for personal belongings. The gyrocopter is designed for a single passenger alongside the pilot, ensuring a fully personalized experience. The open cockpit design provides unobstructed views, and the route is carefully selected to maximize your exposure to Dubai’s skyline, coastline, and signature architecture. For those visiting the city or planning a special occasion, this flight offers an unforgettable way to see Dubai from a whole new angle.

Included in the package are professionally edited photos and video footage of your flight, making it easy to relive and share the experience later. These are captured by the operator and delivered post-flight, eliminating the need to carry your own phone or camera. All you need to bring is a valid ID, fitted athletic clothing with sleeves, and closed-toe shoes. It's recommended to bring sunglasses and a light jacket, especially during the cooler months. Guests should arrive at least 30 minutes before their scheduled flight to allow time for check-in and preparation.

The gyrocopter experience is subject to certain restrictions. It is not suitable for guests under the age of 17, those who weigh over 100 kilograms, pregnant women, or individuals with a fear of heights or motion sickness. Participants must follow a strict dress code and be in good physical condition. If the weather does not permit flying, you’ll be offered a reschedule or full refund. However, missed appointments, late arrivals, or failure to meet the requirements will result in a non-refundable cancellation.

This gyrocopter flight is an excellent addition to any Dubai itinerary. It’s especially suited for solo travelers, bucket-list seekers, and couples looking to book back-to-back rides. With minimal preparation, no license required, and a professionally guided flight, it combines the thrill of flying with the comfort of safety. Whether you’re looking for high-quality aerial photos of Dubai or simply want to tick a unique experience off your list, this flight delivers spectacular views and a sense of freedom that is difficult to match on the ground.
About This Tour

Cancellation & Weather Policy

items: No refunds for late arrivals, no-shows, or missed flights
Flights canceled due to weather will be rescheduled or fully refunded
Participants exceeding the 100 kg limit or under 17 years old will not be permitted to fly
No exceptions made for guests who fail to meet the flight criteria

data.text: FAQ
Is this like skydiving?No — the gyrocopter flight is smooth, scenic, and focused on sightseeing rather than adrenaline.
Can I bring my phone for photos?Phones and cameras are not allowed for safety reasons, but free photos and videos are included.
Can two people fly together?Each gyrocopter holds one passenger. Couples can book back-to-back flights.
What should I wear?Athletic clothing with sleeves and closed-toe shoes. Avoid crop tops, loose items, or sandals.
What happens if it’s too windy or raining?Flights may be rescheduled or refunded if weather conditions make it unsafe to fly.
